DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the relative bioavailability of 2 oral formulations of TKI258, and the effect of food on the bioavailability of TKI258, in adult patients with advanced solid tumor.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability and Food Effect Study of TKI258 (CSF Capsule vs. FMI Tablet) in Adult Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
